EmailTemplate.name: AGG ET04 PSA NS Author Relief Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Aggregate Report Primary Author Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Primary Author listed on Aggregate Report: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Name} has changed.
The new Primary Author is: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Primary_Author__c}.
Please contact your line manager if you have any questions; thank you.
